work.name: Computer Science Lab
work.summary: My work involves mentoring and advising research groups specializing in Explainable AI (XAI) for Computer Vision. I guide researchers in developing interpretability techniques, evaluating AI model explanations, and identifying reasoning vulnerabilities in deep learning systems. My focus is on enhancing the transparency, reliability, and accountability of AI-driven vision models. Through this role, I contribute to advancing XAI research, fostering collaboration, and ensuring that AI systems provide meaningful and trustworthy explanations.

work.name: AI Vietnam Lab
work.summary: Our research focuses on developing and evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs) for the Vietnamese language. We aim to enhance the understanding, generation, and adaptation of LLMs to Vietnamese by addressing linguistic challenges such as tone variations, complex syntax, and limited high-quality datasets.
